text: Heather Thomas (born September 8, 1957) is an American actress and writer. She is also a political activist. She co-starred as Judy Banks on The Fall Guy. Thomas was born in Greenwich, Connecticut. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Greenwich, Connecticut Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Writers from Connecticut Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Heather Thomas
